mysteryDungeon:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
mysteryDungeon:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]turn.[] NL #yEvoke your rightmost Orb.
YOU ARE MINE!

mysteryDungeon:NatureRelatedRelic.NAME: Relique de Nature
DESCRIPTIONS: Vous receverez une relique dépendant de votre nature.

mysteryDungeon:BraveExplorerRelic.NAME: Explorateur Brave
DESCRIPTIONS: Si vous n'avez pas #yd'Armure à la fin du tour, gagnez #b1 #yForce

mysteryDungeon:CalmExplorerRelic.NAME: Explorateur Calme
DESCRIPTIONS: Piochez #b1 carte et gagnez [E] au début de chaque combat.

mysteryDungeon:CellBatteryRelic.NAME: Pile
mysteryDungeon:CellBatteryRelic.FLAVOR: Pile jetable. Tenue, elle augmente l'Attaque lorsque le Pokémon subit une attaque de type Électrik.
DESCRIPTIONS: La #yJauge #yde #yCharge aura maintenant trois espaces au lieu de deux. NL Vous ne retournez plus au centre de la jauge à la fin de vos tours.

mysteryDungeon:CharcoalRelic.NAME: Charbon
mysteryDungeon:CharcoalRelic.FLAVOR: Un combustible qui augmente la puissance des capacités de type Feu.
DESCRIPTIONS: Lorsque vous appliquez un #yDébuff, infligez #b1 dégat à TOUS le ennemis.

mysteryDungeon:DocileExplorerRelic.NAME: Explorateur Docile
DESCRIPTIONS: Lorsque vous recevez un #yDébuff, gagnez #b2 #yd'Armure au tour suivant.

mysteryDungeon:FlameOrbRelic.NAME: Orbe Flamme
mysteryDungeon:FlameOrbRelic.FLAVOR: Un orbe bizarre qui brûle son porteur durant le combat.
DESCRIPTIONS: Au début de chaque combat, appliquez #b9 #yBrûlures à TOUS les ennemis

mysteryDungeon:HardyExplorerRelic.NAME: Hardy Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you lose HP each turn, gain 5 Block. If this HP loss was from a monster's attack, gain 1 Blur

mysteryDungeon:ImpishExplorerRelic.NAME: Impish Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you evoke your last orb each combat, gain a Focus.

mysteryDungeon:JollyExplorerRelic.NAME: Jolly Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with an #yAgility.

mysteryDungeon:QuirkyExplorerRelic.NAME: Quirky Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 5% more Gold in combat rewards.

mysteryDungeon:RelaxedExplorerRelic.NAME: Relaxed Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: Au début de votre tour, #yscrutez #b1 carte.

mysteryDungeon:TimidExplorerRelic.NAME: Timid Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, Retain 1 card.

mysteryDungeon:LightBallRelic.NAME: Light Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a power and you are not in a stance, gain 1 orb slot.

mysteryDungeon:LeftoversRelic.NAME: Leftovers
mysteryDungeon:LeftoversRelic.FLAVOR: Some food left form your last meal
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat heal 3 hit points.

mysteryDungeon:LifeOrbRelic.NAME: Life Orb
mysteryDungeon:LifeOrbRelic.FLAVOR: It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the end of your turn, exhaust a random card from your hand.

mysteryDungeon:MysticWaterRelic.NAME: Mystic Water
mysteryDungeon:MysticWaterRelic.FLAVOR: This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Reduce your maximum hand size by 2.

mysteryDungeon:MiracleSeedRelic.NAME: Miracle Seed
mysteryDungeon:MiracleSeedRelic.FLAVOR: Its a seed invued with life force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you apply #b2 #ydebuffs in a single turn draw a card.

mysteryDungeon:MetronomeRelic.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every turn add a random card in your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

mysteryDungeon:WaveIncenseRelic.NAME: Wave Incense
mysteryDungeon:WaveIncenseRelic.FLAVOR: Its a seed invued with life force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each battle apply the #yMaster #yReality power.
